title: Lamb fore shanks with English vegetables
description: For this recipe I have used lamb fore shanks, taken from the front leg. I find a whole leg shank tends to be too much for one person, whereas a fore shank, being smaller, provides the perfect amount. Ask your butcher for these if you can’t find them in the supermarket.
ingredients: 250g/9oz baby carrots, cut in half lengthways if large
250g/9oz baby turnips, cut in half lengthways if large
salt and freshly ground black pepper
